name: SUPER ARMY OF TENTACLES 3: Summer Outfit Pack II: Shark Week
detailed_description:
Summer Outfit pack 2 of 2.

Outfits included:

Perry: Shark World Visitor
American Dave/Canadian Dave: Sexy Lifeguard
Cady: Nurse Shark
Ein Mozart Nixon: Lobster
Jack: Tiger Shark
Kirk: Great White Shark
Morris: Angler Fish
Ogid New: Great Hammerhead Shark
Phaze: Megalodon
Thatcher: Zebra Shark

Plus 4 alt-outfits for the secret party members.

Shark Week 2017 is July 23rd. It will be the most tubular show on television.
